info:

VLV BODY  - 18
VLV HEADS - 26

DS_SENSE  - 12

PWC       - 37

UART TX   - 38
UART RX   - 40

ADCA1     - 29
ADCA2     - 31
ADCA3     - 33
ADCA4     - 35

<svg version="1.1" style="display: block;" width="100%" height="100%" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 160 300" enable-background="new 0 0 160 300" xml:space="preserve">
//Бак
<path id="cube" style="fill:#EB7E11; !important;" stroke="#000000" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-width="2" fill-opacity="0" d="M42,173.5v5c0,0-32,7-32,18v93c0,2,2,4,4,4h71
c2,0,4-2,4-4v-75h4v-4h-4v-14c0-12-32-18-32-18v-5H42z"></path>

//Царга
<path id="tube" style="fill:#35E43E; !important;" stroke="#000000" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-width="2" fill-opacity="0" d="M42,70.5v11c-13,0-23,4-23,14v44c2,5,2,16,2,16h2
	c0,0,0-11,2-16v-42c0-10,17-8,17-8v81h15v-83h5v-4h-5v-13H42z"></path>

//Тэн
<path id="power" style="fill:#DF2443; !important;" stroke="#000000" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-width="2" fill-opacity="0" d="M62,268h20c1.1,0,2,0.9,2,2l0,0c0,1.1-0.9,2-2,2H62
	c-1.1,0-2-0.9-2-2l0,0C60,268.9,60.9,268,62,268z M62,259h20c1.1,0,2,0.9,2,2l0,0c0,1.1-0.9,2-2,2H62c-1.1,0-2-0.9-2-2l0,0
	C60,259.9,60.9,259,62,259z M62,277h33c1.1,0,2,0.9,2,2l0,0c0,1.1-0.9,2-2,2H62c-1.1,0-2-0.9-2-2l0,0C60,277.9,60.9,277,62,277z"></path>

//Вода
<path style="fill:#358DE4; !important;" stroke="#000000" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-width="2" fill-opacity="1" d="M42,39.5V67h15V34.4c-5.3,2.8-10.6,2.8-15,0V39.5z"></path>
<path id="water" style="fill:#358DE4; !important;" stroke="#000000" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-width="2" fill-opacity="1" d="M40,42h28c1.1,0,2,0.9,2,2l0,0c0,1.1-0.9,2-2,2H40c-1.1,0-2-0.9-2-2l0,0C38,42.9,38.9,42,40,42z
M40,50h20c1.1,0,2,0.9,2,2l0,0c0,1.1-0.9,2-2,2H40c-1.1,0-2-0.9-2-2l0,0C38,50.9,38.9,50,40,50z M40,58h20c1.1,0,2,0.9,2,2l0,0c0,1.1-0.9,2-2,2H40c-1.1,0-2-0.9-2-2l0,0C38,58.9,38.9,58,40,58z"></path>

//Запущен ли процесс
<path id="switcher" style="fill:none; !important;" stroke="white" stroke-miterlimit="10" d="M49.4,17.4v8 M53,19.9c1.8,1.2,2.9,3.2,2.9,5.4c0,3.6-2.9,6.5-6.5,6.5
	s-6.5-2.9-6.5-6.5c0-2.2,1.1-4.2,2.9-5.4"></path>

<g>
//Мощность тэна
	<path style="fill:none; !important;" stroke="#000000" stroke-miterlimit="10" d="M150.1,289.5h-35.7c0-3.3-2.7-5.9-6-5.9c-1.7,0-3.2,0.7-4.3,1.9
		l-4.9-4.9 M104,285.4c-1,1.1-1.7,2.5-1.7,4.1c0,3.3,2.7,6,6,6s6-2.7,6-6c0,0,0,0,0-0.1"></path>

	<text transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 104.5833 293.1173)" font-size="8">W</text>
	<text id="power_txt" color="#FFFFFF" transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 117 286.7083)" font-size="12">0%</text>
</g>

//Температура в кубе
<g>
	<path style="fill:none; !important;" stroke="#000000" stroke-miterlimit="10" d="M145.8,224.5H110c0-3.3-2.7-5.9-6-5.9c-1.7,0-3.2,0.7-4.3,1.9
		l-4.9-4.9 M99.7,220.4c-1,1.1-1.7,2.5-1.7,4.1c0,3.3,2.7,6,6,6s6-2.7,6-6c0,0,0,0,0-0.1"></path>
	<text transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 100.25 228.1173)" font-size="10">К</text>
	<text id="cube_txt" color="#FFFFFF" transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 115 223.375)" font-size="12">N/A</text>
</g>

//Температура в царге
<g>
	<path style="fill:none; !important;" stroke="#000000" stroke-miterlimit="10" d="M114.8,98H79c0-3.3-2.7-5.9-6-5.9c-1.7,0-3.2,0.7-4.3,1.9l-4.9-4.9
		 M68.7,93.9c-1,1.1-1.7,2.5-1.7,4.1c0,3.3,2.7,6,6,6s6-2.7,6-6c0,0,0,0,0-0.1"></path>
	<text transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 68.875 101.5)" font-size="10">Ц</text>
	<text id="tube_txt" color="#FFFFFF" transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 82 97)" font-size="12">N/A</text>
</g>

//Температура воды
<g>
	<path style="fill:none; !important;" stroke="#000000" stroke-miterlimit="10" d="M121.8,55.5H86c0-3.3-2.7-5.9-6-5.9c-1.7,0-3.2,0.7-4.3,1.9l-4.9-4.9
		 M75.7,51.4c-1,1.1-1.7,2.5-1.7,4.1c0,3.3,2.7,6,6,6s6-2.7,6-6c0,0,0,0,0-0.1"></path>
	<text transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 76.0417 59.125)" font-size="10">В</text>
	<text id="water_txt" color="#FFFFFF" transform="matrix(1 0 0 1 90 54.25)" font-size="12">N/A</text>
</g>

//Давление
<text style="fill:#2497BF;font-family:Arial;font-size:10px;" x="93" y="17" id="press_txt" xml:space="preserve">N/A</text>
</svg>
